title: Large 1BR Condo by Southcenter Mall
posting_body: You are welcome to drive by and check out the location.
(from downtown Seattle, take the Southcenter Mall exit "Southcenter Blvd," turn left and go to the next stoplight "Macadam Rd.
S." Turn left on Macadam and go up the hill to 15210.
Turn right on 152nd St. then next right into parking lot of Southcenter View Condominiums and the unit is in the D building, on your right 1st floor.
Large, (700 SF) 1BR condo near Southcenter Mall.
Ground level with patio and reserved covered parking right in front of door.
LVP floors, vinyl windows, large floorplan, fireplace, washer and dryer hookup, excellent location with easy access to I-5 and I-405.
Water, sewer and garbage fee $50 per month
Video tour can be seen at:  https://youtu.be/ouNz_zoMmRw
